```{r}
source("../src/prepareDf.R")
library(FRAPO)
library(fPortfolio)
```
```{r}
lapply(lists.price.adjusted,ts.plot)

month.end.index <- which(.indexmday(lists.price.adjusted[[1]])==30)
komp.month.end<-lists.price.adjusted[[1]][month.end.index]
plot(komp.month.end)
pr <- komp.month.end
```
```{r}
lists.monthly.ohlc<-lapply(lists.price.adjusted,to.monthly)
lapply(lists.monthly.ohlc,plot)
```


```{r}
RDP <- lapply(pr,function(x){na.omit((x / lag(x, k = 1) - 1) * 100)})
lapply(RDP,plot)
```
